data.eml:eml: Three new polar species of Sternaspis Otto, 1821 (Polychaeta: Sternaspidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Salazar-Vallejo, Sergio I. (2014): Three new polar species of Sternaspis Otto, 1821 (Polychaeta: Sternaspidae). Zootaxa 3861 (4): 333-344, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.4.3
